name: KingOfEgyptGX
description:
King of Egypt GX is an amazing platform game with smooth controls!

You are Henry Page searching for the Sceptre of Thoth to resurect your wife, died some years ago.

Fulfill your destiny, play King of Egypt GX, and experience the thrills and adventures of this mysterious tale.

- Beautiful graphics
- New worlds to discover
- Captivating music
- Smooth controls
- Levels are filled with traps and with guards who can only be defeated by excellent swordplay or trickery!

Fight against the most famous and powerful Gods of Ancient Egypt in King of Egypt GX!
